name: Spirited Away
desc: A young girl, Chihiro, is transported to another world and finds herself in a strange new world.

name: Ejen Ali 2
desc: After discovering her grandfather was an secret agent, Aliya must learn to work with Ejen Ali to uncover the truth about her family's past.

name: Tenet
desc: A secret agent goes undercover to infiltrate the world of international espionage.

name: Flow
desc: A stray black cat, Flow, lives in a world where magic is real. He dreams of becoming a great wizard, but his lack of magic makes him an outcast. One day, he meets a young girl who shares his dream and together they embark on a journey to discover the secrets of magic.

name: Blood Brothers
desc: Ariff, a loyal bodyguard, is accused of betraying Dato Zul, a prominent figure who once supported him. To prove his innocence, Ariff seeks help from his estranged brother, Jaki. As Ariff attempts to clear his name, he is pursued by Ghaz, the leader of an elite bodyguard unit and Ariffâ€™s former close friend. Once considered "Blood Brothers," their conflict evolves into a struggle involving trust, loyalty, and personal redemption. Set against a backdrop of deception and hidden agendas, Ariff must navigate both physical threats and emotional turmoil to uncover the truth.

name: Karate Kid Legends
desc: After moving to New York City with his mother, kung fu prodigy Li Fong struggles to let go of the past as he tries to fit in with his new classmates. When a new friend needs his help, Li enters a karate competition -- but his skills alone aren't enough. With help from Mr. Han and Daniel LaRusso, he soon learns to merge two styles into one for the ultimate martial arts showdown.
